    "file_path": "h2q_project/quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import torch

def quaternion_conjugate(q):
    w, x, y, z = torch.unbind(q, dim=-1)
    return torch.stack((w, -x, -y, -z), dim=-1)

def quaternion_multiply(q1, q2):
    w1, x1, y1, z1 = torch.unbind(q1, dim=-1)
    w2, x2, y2, z2 = torch.unbind(q2, dim=-1)

    w = w1 * w2 - x1 * x2 - y1 * y2 - z1 * z2
    x = w1 * x2 + x1 * w2 + y1 * z2 - z1 * y2
    y = w1 * y2 - x1 * z2 + y1 * w2 + z1 * x2
    z = w1 * z2 + x1 * y2 - y1 * x2 + z1 * w2
    return torch.stack((w, x, y, z), dim=-1)


def quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q):
    w, x, y, z = torch.unbind(q, dim=-1)
    
    tx = 2.0 * x
    ty = 2.0 * y
    tz = 2.0 * z
    twx = tx * w
    twy = ty * w
    twz = tz * w
    txx = tx * x
    txy = ty * x
    txz = tz * x
    tyy = ty * y
    tyz = tz * y
    tzz = tz * z

    matrix = torch.empty(q.shape[:-1] + (3, 3), dtype=q.dtype, device=q.device)
    matrix[..., 0, 0] = 1.0 - (tyy + tzz)
    matrix[..., 0, 1] = txy - twz
    matrix[..., 0, 2] = txz + twy
    matrix[..., 1, 0] = txy + twz
    matrix[..., 1, 1] = 1.0 - (txx + tzz)
    matrix[..., 1, 2] = tyz - twx
    matrix[..., 2, 0] = txz - twy
    matrix[..., 2, 1] = tyz + twx
    matrix[..., 2, 2] = 1.0 - (txx + tyy)

    return matrix


def rotation_matrix_to_quaternion(matrix, eps=1e-6):
    batch_dim = matrix.shape[:-2]
    R = matrix.reshape((-1, 3, 3))

    trace = torch.diagonal(R, dim1=-1, dim2=-2).sum(-1)

    quaternion = torch.empty(R.shape[:-2] + (4,), dtype=matrix.dtype, device=matrix.device)
    mask = trace > 0
    if mask.any():
        S = 0.5 / torch.sqrt(trace[mask] + 1.0)
        quaternion[mask, 0] = 0.25 / S
        quaternion[mask, 1] = (R[mask, 2, 1] - R[mask, 1, 2]) * S
        quaternion[mask, 2] = (R[mask, 0, 2] - R[mask, 2, 0]) * S
        quaternion[mask, 3] = (R[mask, 1, 0] - R[mask, 0, 1]) * S

    mask = ~mask
    if mask.any():
        n4 = torch.diagonal(R[mask], dim1=-1, dim2=-2)
        i = torch.argmax(n4, axis=-1)
        j = (i + 1) % 3
        k = (i + 2) % 3
        S = torch.sqrt((R[mask, i, i] - R[mask, j, j] - R[mask, k, k] + 1.0).clamp(min=0)) * 2
        quaternion[mask, 0] = (R[mask, k, j] - R[mask, j, k]) / S
        quaternion[mask, i + 1] = 0.25 * S
        quaternion[mask, j + 1] = (R[mask, i, j] + R[mask, j, i]) / S
        quaternion[mask, k + 1] = (R[mask, i, k] + R[mask, k, i]) / S

    return quaternion.reshape(batch_dim + (4,))
"

WORKDIR /app

COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

COPY . .

# Install debugging tools
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    gdb \
    strace \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CMD ["python", "main.py"]"
